description: The most powerful and extensible open source Wiki software

instructions.end:
Wiki.js is deployed and available as $$cap_appname. 

 IMPORTANT: It will take up to 2 minutes for Wiki.js to be ready. Before that, you might see 502 error page.
instructions.start: Wiki.js is a fully open source, adaptable platform for building and running a Wiki.

variables.label: Wiki.js Version
variables.description: It's highly recommended that you don't use the latest tag but instead the major version you need, e.g. requarks/wiki:2

variables.label: DB_TYPE
variables.description: Type of database (mysql, postgres, mariadb, mssql or sqlite)

variables.label: DB_HOST
variables.description: Hostname or IP of the database

variables.label: DB_USER
variables.description: Username to connect to the database

variables.label: DB_PASS
variables.description: Password to connect to the database

variables.label: DB_SSL
variables.description: Set to either 1 or true to enable. (optional, off if omitted)
